billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Requires contractors to give immediate written notice to the crime victims board regarding payments of profit of a crime
summary: Requires contractors to give immediate written notice to the crime victims board regarding payments of profit of a crime and imposes civil liability for the failure to comply therewith.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to payments received as profit for a crime
